text: Fast and friendly service! Good location at Woodleigh Mall B1. Love the bubble tea!

Good, ordered the Shake shake fries w garlic seafood, then the staff asked to join membership so can get a drink with it for $5.90. Was worth it. Got the Tofu fries sour plum flavour as well. Overall good. It's Hot, Fresh, Crispy, well seasoned/coated with the Seasoning.

The staff are very smiley and friendly - are great attributes to provide good service. Service wise is excellent!! I only tried the bubble tea so I can’t comment about other food even though I tried their cutlets many years ago. Their bubble milk tea has failed to entice me to repeat purchase as the bubbles doesn’t go very well with the tea. I cannot explain but I can only rate it 2 out of 5. Unfortunately I am unable to separate the bubble from the milk tea. I will definitely give their bubble milk a pass.

The fried snacks are really good! Sweet potato fries were especially good. The fried chicken was tender with a crispy exterior too. Definitely worth a snack on if you're looking for tea-time options in the area.

Milk tea was alright, there are other better options boba tea options in the mall.
Have been drinking taimei for number of years as it has lovely tea & less sugar options
